title: Rugged
extract:
Rugged is a 2018 Indian Romantic Action Entertainer Kannada film written and directed by Sri Mahesh Gowda and produced by Arun Kumar A. The film caption is "Neenu Malagisiruva Goriyolage Nanninu Jeevathavagiddene". 
This Movie was launched in November 2017
extract_html: Rugged is a 2018 Indian Romantic Action Entertainer Kannada film written and directed by Sri Mahesh Gowda and produced by Arun Kumar A. The film caption is "Neenu Malagisiruva Goriyolage Nanninu Jeevathavagiddene". This Movie was launched in November 2017
